term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - additivity of mass spectra
term.title: additivity

item.text: The process by which each chemical species present in the ion source at a certain partial pressure makes a contribution to the total mass spectrum which is the same as that which it would give if that chemical species alone were present in the ion source at a pressure equal to this certain partial pressure.
